description: Detects the download of a file with a potentially suspicious extension from a .zip top level domain.
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Legitimate file downloads from a websites and web services that uses the ".zip" top level domain.
name: Potentially Suspicious File Download From ZIP TLD
query: (Contents:*.zip\/* AND file.path.text:("*.bat\:Zone*" OR "*.dat\:Zone*" OR "*.dll\:Zone*" OR "*.doc\:Zone*" OR "*.docm\:Zone*" OR "*.exe\:Zone*" OR "*.hta\:Zone*" OR "*.pptm\:Zone*" OR "*.ps1\:Zone*" OR "*.rar\:Zone*" OR "*.rtf\:Zone*" OR "*.sct\:Zone*" OR "*.vbe\:Zone*" OR "*.vbs\:Zone*" OR "*.ws\:Zone*" OR "*.wsf\:Zone*" OR "*.xll\:Zone*" OR "*.xls\:Zone*" OR "*.xlsm\:Zone*" OR "*.zip\:Zone*"))
